en.title: How to Clean Your Cat's Ears: Safe Techniques and Frequency
en.content:
A cat's ears are a barometer of their health. Check them regularly and clean them as needed.

Signs That Ear Cleaning Is Needed

Ear cleaning is necessary when you notice brown or black buildup inside the ears, when there's an odor, or when your cat is frequently scratching at their ears.

Proper Ear Cleaning Steps

Place a few drops of cat-specific ear cleaning solution (ear cleaner) into the ear canal, then gently massage the base of the ear. After your cat shakes their head and the solution comes out, gently wipe it away with cotton or gauze. Be careful not to push cotton swabs deep into the ear canal.

Recommended Frequency

For healthy cats, cleaning once or twice a month is sufficient. Cats that produce excessive earwax or are prone to otitis externa (outer ear infections) may need more frequent cleaning.

zh.title: 猫咪耳朵清洁方法：安全的操作步骤与频率
zh.content:
猫咪的耳朵是健康的晴雨表。请定期检查，必要时进行清洁。

需要清洁耳朵的信号

当耳朵内部出现明显的棕色或黑色污垢、有异味，或者猫咪频繁抓挠耳朵时，就需要进行耳朵清洁了。

正确的耳朵清洁步骤

将猫咪专用的洗耳液（耳道清洁液）滴几滴到耳朵里，然后轻轻按摩耳根部位。等猫咪甩头让液体出来后，用棉球或纱布轻轻擦拭。注意不要将棉签深入耳道内部。

建议的清洁频率

健康的猫咪每月清洁1～2次即可。耳垢较多或容易患外耳炎的猫咪则需要更频繁地清洁。
